name: CruelField
description:
Made for the 'Bullet Hell Game jam #2' game jam.

Welcome to CruelField. This used to be a nice town filled with nice people. But now.. It's nothing more than a place ransacked with sadistic savages and pollution. Will you survive the rampage? Will you make it onto the leaderboard? Only time and your skills will tell...

Key Features
  • Fast-paced, action gameplay!
  • Shoot a large variety of mentally insane people!
  • Beautiful, low poly 3D graphics
  • Online leaderboard system. Can you make it onto the leaderboard?
  • Easter eggs. Can you find them?
  • Gameplay controller support! (Only tested with PS4 Controller)
  • Cause complete mayhem!
